Text: Thank you 20-40.  You provide a great service with great clean downloads.  Read your statement about providing the shorter versions (which still play great on must players) for those on dialup and/or using older equipment.  Brings back horrible memories.  You're the best.  Thanks.

well slow start, interesting premise however we shall see...on another note where you usually do castle and due to the "glitch" with uploading to tpb earlier this week will you be able to upload e22. missed you for my shows glad you never left us. thanks great upload short sweet and clear...
Seeding is sharing.
